citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility has had a new part-time attending veterinarian (AV) since June of 2024. The AV has not established a written
program of veterinary care (PVC) for the facility. A veterinary sign off sheet for the facility shows there was a visit to the
facility on 4/6/2025 but the written PVC has not been updated. This document is required to ensure the facility has a guide
to follow concerning the care of the animals, including preventive care, emergency care, euthanasia, and other topics, for
the health and well-being of the animals. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal
arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall
include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility has had a new part-time attending veterinarian (AV) since June of 2024. The AV has not established a written 
program of veterinary care (PVC) for the facility. A veterinary sign off sheet for the facility shows there was a visit to the 
facility on 4/6/2025 but the written PVC has not been updated. This document is required to ensure the facility has a guide 
to follow concerning the care of the animals, including preventive care, emergency care, euthanasia, and other topics, for 
the health and well-being of the animals. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal 
arrangements. In the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall 
include a written program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
